name: adaptability
caption: Adaptability

effect.short: Increases the [same-type attack bonus]{mechanic:same-type-attack-bonus} from 1.5× to 2×.
effect.full: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual [same-type attack bonus]{mechanic:same-type-attack-bonus} of 1.5×.

flavorText: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
